__TOC__

This is the home page for the Upper Peninsula LoCo Team.  The purpose of this team is to spread the word of open source software, encourage people to use open source software, further the use of the Ubuntu operating system and it's sister projects, as well as provide support to people who use the software.  This team is currently being formed, and encompasses the Upper Peninsula of Michigan.  If you are interested in joining or have any questions, please don't hesitate to email me at jtm49855@gmail.com.  Don't forget, any and all help is appreciated! :)

You can also get more information, or ask questions in our IRC channel #ubuntu-upperpeninsula on the irc.freenode.net server.

Please Note: This wiki is now obsolete as the name has changed to "Upper Michigan LoCo Team" and the current wiki can be found at https://wiki.ubuntu.com/UpperMichiganTeam.
